Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are up in arms about the $10 million initiative to crack down on scammers who send fake texts expected to be announced in next month's federal budget. The move comes as fraudulent texts continue to plague Australians and many have fallen victim to such scams. Pharmacists are also urging the Federal Government to scrap proposed changes to double dispensing time which they fear would leave vulnerable people without necessary medication. Meanwhile the Federal Government is considering increasing the rate of unemployment benefits following an expert committee's suggestion. On a more alarming note leaked documents from the Pentagon reveal that Australiaâ€™s military satellites could be hijacked by China in the event of war.
